name: ArtSky Platform
tagline: A  new age Fine art space to develop and propagate  new pedagogical methods and tools for Fine Art studio practice.
body:
### Welcome to ArtSky Platform.
ArtSky Platform plans to radically change the way art is taught. It invites institutions and brilliant individual artists to creatively use  and contribute to content repositories . New tools will be developed and ArtSky will propagate the artistic usage of existing tools. The ArtSky Platform  [website](https://github.com/A-S-Sajith/ArtSky-Platform/generate), will be a creative hub for artists, coders and art institutions.. 
### If you are an Institution or a creative Individual
ArSky platform requests your participation in the Project. 


### Authors and Contributors
SA
### Support or Contact
 The project is young at its planning stage. [readme](https://github.com/A-S-Sajith/ArtSky-Platform/readme.md).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
